cyclone.name: MATTHEW
cyclone.current_location: about 125 miles SE of Cape Canaveral, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: continuing northwest then turning north-northwest, skirting the east coast of Florida and then moving toward the coasts of Georgia and South Carolina
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or just offshore of the east-central Florida coast (around Cape Canaveralâ€“Daytona Beach area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch from Englewood to Anclote River, FL
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Boca Raton, FL to South Santee River, SC and north-western Bahamas; Tropical Storm Warning Ocean Reef to south of Boca Raton, FL and portions of FL Big Bend and NC coast
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida east coast, Georgia coast, South Carolina coast, parts of North Carolina coast
weather_observation.wind: None expected as Matthew is now far northwest of Puerto Rico
